Name: Bagels & Wraps
Review Text:
Good place for a bagel.
I want with sister for breakfast and we shared two bagels-both were warm and fresh. I also got the big orange juice which was freshly made.
The decor isn’t the best but we liked the place and will probably be back.

Name: Bagels & Wraps
Review Text: Wow, the food here was delicious. Small little shop where you can get good healthy food and coffee. Recommended for a quick light meal.

Name: Bagels & Wraps
Review Text: what a waste of time and money. ordered melted tuna bagel for 5.20 euro. the tuna was okay, but very thin layer. the worst part was the bagel itself - it wasn't fresh, at least 2-days old - even toasting couldn't hide this fact. after …

Name: Bagels & Wraps
Review Text: Best bagels in town!! Friendly, quick service. I recommend the New York bagel and the Valley girl wrap. So tasty!

Name: Bagels & Wraps
Review Text: Great place for a quick bite. The warm bagels are delicious and easy to eat. Also sells drinks including juices and sodas. If you're confounded by the Dutch menu on the wall, they have an English menu on the counter or just ask!

Name: Bagels & Wraps
Review Text: Our favourite breakfast place in the city. Cheaper than what you'd usually pay but the food is fantastic. Lovely little find, will order from here again when we're back. (they also do take outs!)

Name: Bagels & Wraps
Review Text: Here we go... customer service is lacking severely. We went here as we needed something simple, but it was far from that. I requested ham and cheese on a white bagel with extra onions - paid extra with seemingly no problems. …

Name: Bagels & Wraps
Review Text: Great service. Excellent food. Was best experience of amsterdam. The bagel was full of flavour. Can not express how good this little tiny places food is!!

Name: Bagels & Wraps
Review Text: Great value and tasty grilled bagles, served with natchos. Perfect for lunch, i paid 7 euro grilled bagel and 50 cl coke. Staff was alittle unengaged.

Name: Bagels & Wraps
Review Text: Good fresh food but the place need refresh

Name: Bagels & Wraps
Review Text: We had breakfast here and it was superb! They have special breakfast offers - tea/coffee bagel with jam and orange juice for good price around 5€.

Name: Bagels & Wraps
Review Text: I ordered a ciabatta ham & cheese, they didn't put the vegetables in (tomatoes, lettuce and cucumber) the sandwich. It just felt so empty when I opened it...

Name: Bagels & Wraps
Review Text: Small place... but Jesus the valley girl wrap was great, plus the tea is nice. I can't wait to try the muffin

Name: Bagels & Wraps
Review Text:
Small shop with great Quality..
A quick byte for Take away or Sit down with a good caffe Latte. This shop got it all!

Name: Bagels & Wraps
Review Text: Found by accident. Great value and great tasting lunch time meals.  Take away a wrap to eat in the park.

Name: Bagels & Wraps
Review Text: Great price quality and service. Go often to grab a lunch from here to go.

Name: Bagels & Wraps
Review Text: Surprisingly good everything bagel. And I'm from Brooklyn.

Review Text: Love the Veggie & Mozzerella bagel! <3

Name: Bagels & Wraps
Review Text: Overpriced and cream instead of coffee. It’s an insult.

Name: Bagels & Wraps
Review Text: I am coming here now for several years before work, and I like this place a lot.
